Query.Sentence: WITH PUBLIC_COMPETITIONS AS (SELECT * FROM ${mainschema}.COMPETITIONS WHERE COMP_ISPUBLIC = true) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM PUBLIC_COMPETITIONS #WHERE# #ORDER#;

WITH PUBLIC_COUNT AS ( SELECT c.COMP_ID, c.COMP_NAME, c.COMP_DESCRIPTION, c.COMP_ISPUBLIC, count(uc.USER_) AS NUM_USERS, COUNT(UC.USER_) > 10 AS COMPLETE FROM COMPETITIONS c INNER JOIN USERS_COMPETITIONS uc ON c.COMP_ID = uc.COMP_ID WHERE c.COMP_ISPUBLIC = true GROUP BY c.COMP_ID HAVING COUNT(UC.USER_) < 10) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM PUBLIC_COUNT #WHERE# #ORDER#;
